metadata.description: A bizarre series of murders and rumors of something worse lead Professor Bruttenholm to send a young Hellboy to a Brazilian village on his first mission. Hellboy and a small group of agents uncover something terrible in the shadows of a sixteenth-century Portuguese fortress . . . Hellboy creator Mike Mignola teams with acclaimed artist Alex Maleev.
metadata.name: Hellboy and the B.P.R.D.
